title: A Picture for Harold's room
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Adapted from the book written and illustrated by Crockett Johnson, this animated story tells about a little boy, Harold, who uses a purple crayon to create various adventures in which he alone participates.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
